transcript.title: STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON PJ KEATING MP THE OFFICE OF TREASURER
transcript.content:
TEL: PRIME MINISTER
STATEMENT BY THE PRIME MINISTER, THE HON P J KEATING MP
THE OFFICE OF TREASURER
Following the announcement made tonight by the Treasurer, the Honourable John
Dawkins MP. I shall give consideration to a replacement for the position over the
Christmas period.
In due course, it will be a matter for the Caucus to meet and elect an additional
member of the Ministry.
CANBERRA 17 December, 1993 20.-Dec .93 7: 2t) No. Uui
